parameters.name: SourceIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where SourceTranslatedAddress  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by SourceTranslatedAddress
| project Value = SourceTranslatedAddress, Label = strcat(SourceTranslatedAddress, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: SourcePort
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All")
| where SourcePort  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by SourcePort
| project Value = SourcePort, Label = strcat("Port: ",SourcePort, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: DestinationIP
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID  !contains "Allow" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where DestinationIP  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationIP
| project Value = DestinationIP, Label = strcat(DestinationIP, " count: ", Count)

parameters.name: DestinationPort
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID  !contains "Allow" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All"
| where DestinationPort  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationPort
| project Value = DestinationPort, Label = strcat(DestinationPort, " count: ", Count)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| summarize Count = count() by Protocol
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top blocked protocols

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where SourceUserPrivileges == SourceUserName
| summarize Count = count() by SourceUserName
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top blocked locations

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where DestinationPort   != "0" 
| extend dst_port = tostring(DestinationPort) 
| summarize Count = count() by  dst_port
| top 10 by Count desc nulls last
content.title: Top blocked destination ports

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where DestinationIP != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationIP
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top blocked destination IP addresses

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID  !contains "Allow" 
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where SourceTranslatedAddress  != "" 
| summarize Count = count() by SourceTranslatedAddress
| sort by Count desc
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top blocked source IP addresses

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID !contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where SourcePort   != "0" 
| extend src_port = tostring(SourcePort) 
| summarize Count = count() by  src_port
| order by Count
| take 10
content.title: Top blocked source ports

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID  contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| summarize ['Recived MB'] = sum(ReceivedBytes/1024.0/1024.0), ['Sent MB'] = sum(SentBytes/1024.0/1024.0) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), SourceUserPrivileges
| project-rename Location = SourceUserPrivileges 
| order by ['Recived MB'] desc, ['Sent MB'] desc
content.title: Non-http downloads and uploads in MB

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceEventClassID  contains "Allow"
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| summarize ['Recived MB'] = sum(ReceivedBytes/1024.0/1024.0), ['Sent MB'] = sum(SentBytes/1024.0/1024.0) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), SourceUserPrivileges
| project-rename Location = SourceUserPrivileges 
| where Location == dynamic({LocationFilter}).childRows[0].Location or dynamic({LocationFilter}).Location == Location or dynamic({LocationFilter}).Location == "*"
content.title: Non-http downloads and uploads in MB

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct == "NSSFWlog" 
| where (SourceTranslatedAddress in ({SourceIP}) or '{SourceIP:label}' == "All") and (SourcePort in ({SourcePort}) or '{SourcePort:label}' == "All") and (DestinationIP in ({DestinationIP}) or '{DestinationIP:label}' == "All") and (DestinationPort in ({DestinationPort}) or '{DestinationPort:label}' == "All")
| where Activity !contains "Default"  and Activity !contains "Recommended" 
| summarize count()  by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}), Activity
content.title: Non-default firewall rules getting triggered
